CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: BlackRock California Municipal Income Trusts BFZ the Trust investment objective is to provide current income exempt from regular US federal income and California income taxes. The Trust seeks to achieve its investment objective by investing primarily in municipal obligations exempt from federal income taxes except that the interest may be subject to the federal alternative minimum tax and California income taxes. The Trust invests under normal market conditions at least 80% of its assets in municipal obligations that are investment grade quality. The Trust may invest directly in such securities or synthetically through the use of derivatives. The Trust seeks to achieve its investment objective by investing primarily in municipal obligations exempt from U.S. federal income taxes (except that the interest may be subject to the federal alternative minimum tax) and California income taxes.
